1424130.name: Cave Path
1424130.description:
Cave Path is a mining adventure where you explore caves to collect precious ores, all while battling enemies and a constant drain on your health. Once your health runs out, you’re sent back to the surface with whatever loot you’ve gathered. Use your earnings to upgrade your skills and gear, then dive back in for even bigger rewards!

  • Mining and Bombs: Break through blocks using your pickaxe or bombs to gather valuable resources like silver, gold, diamonds, and rubies. Going deeper leads to better ore—but also tougher challenges.

  • Beware of Darkness: Place candles to prevent monsters from spawning in dark areas. If they do appear, fend them off with your shotgun—just remember your ammo is limited.

  • Skill Upgrades: Unlock powerful perks such as Instakill (a chance to defeat enemies instantly), Extra Miner (summon a helping hand), and Damage Resist (take less damage over time). Customize your character to match your play style.

  • High Risk, High Reward: Deeper caves mean stronger foes and harsher conditions, but also bigger profits. How far will you push your luck before it’s time to head back?

Take on the challenge, uncover hidden riches, and see how deep you can go in Cave Path!
1424130.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
